message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your position, but $14,000 is already a competitive price. Could you meet me halfway at $12,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. I'm still looking to keep my investment within my budget. I would like to propose $11,000 as the purchase price for the product. This is my final offer.
